DOC.brief_summary: This study assess effectiveness intrauterine fibroid polyp removal use Interlace Medical 1st generation hysteroscopic morcellator device base retrospective review medical record woman treat device .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Evaluation Interlace Medical Hysteroscopic Morcellator
DOC.detailed_description: A retrospective review medical record eleven ( 11 ) premenopausal woman treat new hysteroscopic morcellator conduct four hospital ambulatory surgical center site . Four physician perform hysteroscopic operative procedure remove intrauterine polyp , type 0 ( completely within uterine cavity ) , type I ( mostly within cavity ) type II ( < 40 % within cavity ) submucous myoma . Percent pathology remove , total morcellation time , total fluid use , fluid deficit treatment-related adverse event assess . Each four treating physician also evaluate device performance use 10 point scale ( 1 = `` poor '' 10 = `` excellent '' ) .
DOC.criteria: female least 18 year old treat intrauterine submucosal fibroid ( Type 0 1 myoma and/or polyp use Interlace 1st generation morcellator device .
